attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Its about time England got the attention it deserves from the over ruling British Government! We want and demand an English parliment to Stop the hypercritical Scottish and Welsh voting in the British Parliment on matters that concern Soley The great nation of ENGLAND

(either that or take the more cost effective and more sensible option of disbanding the Scott's Parliment and Welsh assembly)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
